homepage.content: The application EcoTaxoGuide allows users to browse synthetic pages that explain how to taxonomically classify objects on images acquired through various instruments and how to disambiguate similar-looking objects. These pages are meant to become available directly from EcoTaxa. This is a Beta version and improvements are ongoing. Our team has already populated the application with many taxa as seen on ZooScan images and has begun the same work for UVP and Flowcam/Planktoscope images. If you do not find your taxon/instrument of interest, you can register and create it. Be sure to read the embedded HOW TO page first and please contact piqv@imev-mer.fr for better coordination. We hope that this resource will prove useful! https://ecotaxoguide.imev-mer.fr/ Latest count of objects in EcoTaxa: 518 millions! The new Zooprocess 8.27 is available. Access the website of the Quantitative Imagery Platform of Villefranche for documentation, manuals, literature and registering to training sessions.

maintenance.content: EcoTaxa will be shut down on Monday, the 3rd of February 2025, from 8:00 to 9:00 UTC for an application upgrade. We apologize for any inconvenience.
